title: From Trial to the Real Thing….?
detail_text: <:th_ch0108/>Hey hey, Ayumu. Did Nozomi give you the “Washi Washi”~?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Yes! Ehehe…. It felt good<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Wow! Ayumu is one of us huh~! Then, I want you to do it to me too~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Ah, but the one I got is the trial version, is that fine?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Trial version….?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Mari-san, if can do the trial version well, please teach me the real thing<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>I don’t really get it, but okay! Alright! Come on!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Then, here I go! Washi Washi Washi~~~♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>What?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Washi Washi Washi~♪ It’s a little bit tricky to keep petting at a high speed like this. But I practiced it with Rina-chan, so I’m used to it now. How was it? Was my Washi Washi good?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>….O-, of course~! It’s perfect!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Yay! Then, would you teach me the real thing?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Umm, actually…. Before I can teach you the real thing, there are more steps that you need to get through….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>I-, is that so….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Don’t make that face! I’ll teach you the novice version of the Washi Washi. Stand there, Ayumu<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Okay<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Here I go. Washi Washi Washi~~~♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Kyaah---! Ahahaha, ahaha, it-, it tickles~~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Fufu, how was it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Haah, Haah…. So the novice version is tickling the stomach huh…. I understand! I’ll practice hard on this one too!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
